thread.title: Men At Large Star Dave Tolliver's Hit Single "Home" Nominated For Hollywood Music In Media Award
thread.title_full: Men At Large Star Dave Tolliver's Hit Single "Home" Nominated For Hollywood Music In Media Award

author: Seante Collins
title: Men At Large Star Dave Tolliver's Hit Single "Home" Nominated For Hollywood Music In Media Award
text: Spectra Music Group recording artist Dave Tolliver, lead singer of the platinum R&B duo Men At Large, has been nominated for "Best R&B/Soul" song at the Hollywood Music In Media Awards. The event will take place November 11th, 2015 at the Fonda Theatre in Los Angeles, California. The Billboard chart-topping hit single "Home" was produced by Carl Borden and is the lead single from Tolliver's second solo album "Somethin Like The Greatest". "Home" has been featured in film and television shows including the season three finale of Centric's hit television show "Single Ladies" (Last Dance). "We really wanted to bring back the love and soul to R&B music. I really believed we did that with Home." said the song's award- winnning record producer Carl Borden at a recent NARAS event in Miami.
